alert.note: Alert for Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:21PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GOSPER COUNTy THROUGH 200 PM CDT... At 120 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Arapahoe, or 25 miles west of Holdrege, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elwood around 140 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Smithfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
